text: Stefan Grygelko (June 17, 1967 â€“ April 3, 2023), better known by the stage name Heklina, was an American actor, drag queen, and entrepreneur in San Francisco. Heklina is half-Icelandic and named herself after the Icelandic volcano Hekla.Swan, Rachel, "Kiss That Stud Goodbye" , East Bay Express, August 13, 2008. Retrieved 20 September 2009. He founded Mother formerly Trannyshack (1996). Grygelko was found dead in London, England on April 3, 2023. He was 55. ==References== ==Other websites== * Trannyshack website * Heklina's Official Facebook Page * Heklina's YouTube video channel * videos of Heklina's performances and Filthy Gorgeous, The Trannyshack Story * SF Oasis : The Club * Heklina Talks About Mother, The New Incarnation Of Trannyshack At The Oasis Category:1967 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Minnesota Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota Category:Businesspeople from San Francisco Category:Drag queens Category:LGBT people from California
title: Heklina
